title: Frankenmuth police warn local businesses about counterfeit money
content:
FRANKENMUTH (WJRT) - (09/04/15) - Police in Frankenmuth are warning local businesses to be on the look out for counterfeit money. 
 
A fake $100 bill recently turned up at a local store. 
 
Police say it didn't feel right, had some foreign language markings and didn't pass a marker test. 
 
If you come across any suspicious bills, give Frankenmuth police a call.
